thread.title: Gucci Mane - Make Love Feat. Nicki Minaj
thread.title_full: Gucci Mane - Make Love Feat. Nicki Minaj

author: Kevin Goddard
title: Gucci Mane - Make Love Feat. Nicki Minaj
text: N/A () Nicki Minaj assists Gucci Mane on his new single "Make Love." Gucci Mane warned earlier tonight that he was dropping the “hardest song of the year” tonight, and he may have just done that. At the stroke of midnight, Gucci released a new single with Young Money songstress Nicki Minaj called “Make Love,” which is presumed to be off his upcoming album DropTopWop dropping later his year. Hit play and let us know what you think of the collab! I'm dropping the hardest song of the year at midnight #DroptopWop — Gucci Mane (@gucci1017) February 24, 2017 DEFAULT
